actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the testimony and representation of Senate employees in the case of United States v. jorge Artalego, (D.C. Superior Ct.)

summary.text: Authorizes Frances Murrah, Melissa Ferring, and Erin Mewhirter, employees of Senator Lloyd Bentsen, to testify in the case of United States v. Jorge Artalego, except concerning privileged matters. Directs the Senate legal counsel to represent those three and any other staff assistant of Senator Bentsen who may be subpoenaed to testify in such case.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the testimony and representation of Senate employees in the case of United States v. jorge Artalego, (D.C. Superior Ct.)
